So I have this problem with this torrent unlike any other album I've come across: the entire CD when dragged into iTunes registers as a single track (which is well over an hour) instead of dividing up into the individual songs. I realize that it's possible to divide up the songs individually with the song times on the tracklist you've provided, but I just wanted to point out the tedium for people interested in downloading this torrent.
